Selected Answer: C
Key Characteristics of Full Selectors:
Contain the application/window title or application name.
Include the entire hierarchical path to uniquely identify the element.
Independent of the container's scope.
Conclusion:
C is the correct answer as it represents a full selector, containing the top-level application and hierarchical path details.

Selected Answer: C
The app name in option C signifies that it is a full selector as it is giving top level information.

Selected Answer: C
As the name suggests, The Step Out is used for stepping out and pausing the execution at the level of the current container. Step Out completes the execution of activities in the current container, before pausing the debugging.

questions.question_text:
You have two string variables called Name and City. You want to construct a new sentence that includes the values from the following variables:
My name is <Name> and I live in <City>
Which expression will provide the required output?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
The given answer is correct

questions.question_text: You observed a developer using a configuration file to store the user's Email credentials as plain text when developing an unattended automation. What is a best practice regarding storing the credentials?

choices.C: Store the encrypted credentials as Orchestrator Text Assets
choices.A: Store the credentials in each Orchestrator Queue Item
choices.B: Use a Credential Store to store the credentials
choices.D: Store the credentials as Orchestrator Text Assets
